author: Dylan Archer <dylarcher@gmail.com> (@dylarcher)
description: A github starter template for creating a new repository with a set of predefined structures, documents and configurations.
name: my-starter-package

scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist-build && npm run clean:libs
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:dist-build && npm run clean && npm run clean:cache
scripts.clean:dist-build: npx rimraf dist lib test/coverage .vscode-test types bin build/.tsbuildinfo
scripts.format: npx biome format --write --config-path .github/configs/biome.json src && node build/fix-markdown-lines.js && npx markdownlint-cli --config .github/configs/.markdownlint-fix.json --fix .github/**/*.md ./docs/**/*.md ./src/**/*.md ./README.md ./CHANGELOG.md && npx markdownlint-cli --config .github/configs/.markdownlintrc.json .github/**/*.md ./docs/**/*.md ./src/**/*.md ./README.md ./CHANGELOG.md
scripts.lint: npx biome lint --write --config-path .github/configs/biome.json src && npx yamllint -c .github/configs/yaml-lint.yaml .github/**/*.yml && npx markdownlint-cli --config .github/configs/.markdownlintrc.json .github/**/*.md ./docs/**/*.md ./src/**/*.md ./README.md ./CHANGELOG.md
scripts.update:starter-files: git remote get-url template || git remote add template https://github.com/dylarcher/git.starter-template.git && git fetch template && git merge template/main --allow-unrelated-histories
